mapper.select: select e.emp_code,emp_class,emp_password,emp_name,emp_level,emp_gender,emp_address,emp_hiredate,emp_retiredate,emp_career,emp_sarlary,emp_bonus,emp_position,emp_salarybank,emp_salarybanknumber,emp_license,emp_licensecode,emp_addfile from emp e, dept d where e.emp_code = #{emp_code} and e.dept_code = d.dept_code;
